resources.string: In the main conversations list, add a colored background to group chats. For performance reasons, you need to kill WhatsApp and start it again for this to take effect (or reboot).
Keep contact list in the history
If you launch a conversation from the contact list, pressing the back button from the conversation will take you to that contacts list, not to the main conversations list screen.
At a certain date and time, your version of WhatsApp will stop functioning. This option prevents it from disabling itself.
